gameDetails.name: La Granja: 2nd Edition Promo Cards
gameDetails.description:
With the second edition 6 promotional cards were given out by the publisher. They are numbered 67 - 72.
The German card names are:
67 - Wanderkrämer (Traveling Grocer)
68 - Hofhändler (Farmyard Trader)
69 - Schindler (Shingle Maker)
70 - Pflücker (Picker)
71 - Zuchtmeister (Breeder)
72 - Handwerker (Artisan)
